Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
1) Download https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview
2) First, create a new wallet (new seed)
3) Note down the address
4) Logout then Login at least two times to verify that the seed is giving you the same address everytime
5) If you face "electrum error", "connection error" or "get_balance error", follow this guide: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
6) Uninstall the old version of agama and don't run it again. But please keep a backup of your old(compromised) seed, wif, privkey or anyother way you used to Access your old wallet. See the following article to backup your old access method: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024424-how-to-secure-your-wallet-seed-private-keys-wallet-dat-file

After that, fill this form for (KMD): https://forms.gle/giVXjRKJ5ThSWvxRA (Links for other assets' Forms are available in this form)

After submitting the form, please read this document carefully to understand the refund process. https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029973-steps-to-reclaim-funds-after-the-agama-incident
Summary: We have sent a small amount of KMD to your compromised address as confirmation that we have moved those funds. Send all the funds from the compromised address to the New address you have submitted in the form to prove ownership.

1) login to Verus Agama using compromised seed
2) send all the funds to the new address you specified in the form
